DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Study Oral S-1 Plus Irinotecan Patients With Advanced Gastric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter Open-label , single-arm , phase I/II clinical trial conduct patient histological stage IV gastric cancer give irinotecan plus S-1 . The usefulness regimens 1st line therapy gastric cancer evaluate disease-free survival rate ( DFR ) , overall survival rate ( OS ) , incidence severity adverse event .
